entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
